interfaces

Interface InterfaceDAO<Generico>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    InterfaceDepartmentsDAO, InterfaceEmployeeDAO
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DepartmentsDAO, EmployeeDAO

    public interface InterfaceDAO<Generico>
    Utilizaremos ésta interface para hacer cualquier clase que hagamos DAO
    Author:
    Diego Santamaría
